attributes.action: declare April 23rd St. George's Day a National Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Let us celebrate our National Day.
This is supported by some Politicians regardless of their party.
The nation comes together to support our teams in sport be it Football, Rugby, Cricket, Olympics, getting donned up with hats, flags and scarfs.
We sing Land of Hope and Glory with feelings that we are proud to be English.
We want to celebrate April 23rd as a National Bank Holiday. England's Day.
Let us show our true Patriotism

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
